response.overview: Perry, in an attempt to appease his parents following a series of disruptions, makes the decision to enter into matrimony. Seeking a temporary solution to buy himself more time and outsmart his family, he strikes a deal with Mimi, compensating her to pose as his girlfriend. Both parties willingly enter into a contractual agreement that outlines specific terms and conditions. However, when Perry's brother unexpectedly arrives and begins to unravel the truth behind their arrangement, a chain of dramatic events ensues.
response.title: Perry's Contract
